Our Team

Core Team

Meet the people who make TechClub possible. Our team is composed of passionate students dedicated to creating a thriving technical community.

AS

Alex Smith

President

Computer Science senior passionate about distributed systems and open source.

JP

Jordan Patel

Vice President

AI/ML enthusiast working on computer vision and natural language processing projects.

SC

Sam Chen

Technical Lead

Full-stack developer with a focus on building scalable web applications.

MR

Morgan Rodriguez

Events Coordinator

Organizing hackathons and workshops, passionate about community building.

TL

Taylor Lee

Content Lead

Technical writer creating tutorials and documentation to help others learn.

RK

Riley Kumar

Outreach Coordinator

Building partnerships with companies and connecting students with opportunities.

Active Members

Our club thrives thanks to the contributions of all our active members. From organizing events to leading project teams, everyone plays a vital role in our community.

We’re always looking for enthusiastic students to join our team. If you’re interested in taking on a leadership role or contributing to the club, please get in touch.
